name: Jason Wildriver
description: Jason Wildriveris a nomad of theAldecaldosclan, who found himself going off-route upon discovering that the man he was assigned to drive had aMilitechbounty on his head. Employed byDakota Smith, Wildriver was expected to do a simple job of chauffeuringBenedict McAdams. Instead of getting out of town, Wildriver drove his passenger to anabandoned houseon Clements St. in the southern region of theBiotechnica Flats, where he would be locked in a cellar up until Dakota sent a second merc,V, to the rescue. McAdams had been provided with food and drink, while not being tied up or otherwise...
